full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNGA MONG GA-YANG SKYABS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES RNGA MONG GI GA-YANG 'GUGS DGOS 'DOD KUN BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DA LTA SKYE BA'I DUS SU RNAM PAD DKAR BA'I BSOD NAMS BSAGS PA'I, GANG ZAG NYIN GYI SKAR MA BZHIN DU 'GA' ZHIG YOD CING PHYUGS BZHI DANG LONGS SPYOD MED NA'ANG STONG STONG MED MED ZHES PA'I DBANG GI RKYEN GYIS MA BYAS @010B KYANG MANG POS NOR LHA RNAMS LAS GANG 'DOD PA'I DNGOS GRUB ZHUS PA GA-YANG 'GUGS KYI RIM PA DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS MANG DU MDZAD PA YOD CING, RNGA MONG GI GA-YANG SKYABS BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR ZHES BYA BA MDZAD PA SOGS SKAD MDOR BSDUS PA ZHIG LAS GZHAN MED PAS BLA MA DE NI SGRUB PA THOB PA ZHIG YIN PAS STON NAS SHES PA'I GSUNGS YIN PA DE LA THAB LHA BSKYED PA DANG, BSANG GA-YANG 'GUGS SOGS KYI KHA SKANG GI THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I DNGOS GRUB 'DOD PA CAN RNAMS KYANG DGOS PA MED NA'ANG, 'JIG RTEN PA'I DNGOS GRUB 'DOD PA BDAG 'DRA BA RES 'GA' LA PHAN SNYAM PA DKAR BA'I SEMS KYIS BSKUL TE, DGE SLONG GI GZUGS 'DZIN PA AARTHA SIDDHI MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
